titleStmt.title: A posie for lovers, or, The terrestrial Venus unmaskt in four poems.
titleStmt.author: T. R. (Thomas Rogers), 1660-1694.

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Rogers. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I The tempest, or, Enchanting lady -- II. The luscious pennance, or, The fasting lady -- III. The feign'd innocence, or, The jealous and whining lady -- IV. To an old gamesome madam who twittingly askt the authour when he design'd to settle the world.
